body_html: Unfortunately no one is working on a distribution for the C++ API right now, so if you're trying to use the C++ API, building against TF with bazel is probably the best way. If you can use the C API and follow the instructions Allen linked to, that should avoid this issue.
body_text: Unfortunately no one is working on a distribution for the C++ API right now, so if you're trying to use the C++ API, building against TF with bazel is probably the best way. If you can use the C API and follow the instructions Allen linked to, that should avoid this issue.
body: Unfortunately no one is working on a distribution for the C++ API right now, so if you're trying to use the C++ API, building against TF with bazel is probably the best way. If you can use the C API and follow the instructions Allen linked to, that should avoid this issue.
